bibl.title: Did Ptolemy I get his Surname from the Rhodians in 304?
bibl.note: "We have good grounds to conclude that Ptolemy I may not have got an epiklesis attached to his name in 304." - Pausanias as an Authority on Ptolemaic Matters. - The Silence of Diodoros. - The Silence of Rhodian Documents.
bibl.seg: HAZZARD R.A., Did Ptolemy I get his Surname from the Rhodians in 304?

"We have good grounds to conclude that Ptolemy I may not have got an epiklesis attached to his name in 304." - Pausanias as an Authority on Ptolemaic Matters. - The Silence of Diodoros. - The Silence of Rhodian Documents.
